news_header: A quarter of Finnish enterprises expect to increase trade with the U.S., with few planning reductions.
news_original_title: EK: Neljännes yrityksistä lisäämässä kauppaa Yhdysvaltoihin
news_text: According to the Confederation of Finnish Industries, a quarter of enterprises responding to the Export Survey expect to increase trade with the United States, with almost no one planning to reduce it. Conducted in early January, the survey reflects concerns about potential trade barriers. Some companies are considering long-term tariffs, while about one-third of export companies anticipate an increase in exports over the next six months.
